article.title: Honeywell Awarded Anti-Terrorism Force Protection Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Honeywell Technology Solutions Incorporated, Columbia, Maryland, is being awarded $28,979,511 for firm-fixed-price task order 0009 under a previously awarded multiple award service contract for Anti-Terrorism Force Protection (ATFP) Ashore global sustainment. The work to be performed provides for the sustainment of life cycle ATFP Ashore projects to include all system-related hardware and software. Services to be provided include corrective and preventative maintenance of the equipment/systems, and the response and resolution of service calls. The task order provides the support necessary to carry out the day-to-day operations and maintenance of ATFP Ashore hardware, software, and related services. The Specialty Center Acquisition, Naval Facilities Engineering Command, Port Hueneme, California, is the contracting activity.
